nodes.text: Krabbis Inn was an under-plaza hostel near the Jedi Temple on Coruscant. It provided accommodations to tourists at cut-rate prices.

In 43 ABY, a short skirmish ensued on the inn when the Mandalorians hired by Chief of State Natasi Daala to spy on the New Jedi Order were discovered by Captain Han Solo and Jedi Knight Leia Organa Solo.
